ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] RE: RE: Network setup help
ygData.msgSnippet: ... GF3 ti200 and ti500. So I will likely be going with that....but then again the GF5s should be coming out within the next few weeks (according to a magazine
ygData.messageBody:
> Scanning through Pricewatch.com I noticed some pretty good prices on the
GF3 ti200 and ti500. So I will likely be going with that....but then again
the GF5s should be coming out within the next few weeks (according to a
magazine article I read) I think, and the prices should fall even further...
>
I hate to sound like I'm spamming, but another site that gives good prices
is pricegrabber.com. It has reviews of the stores selling the products as
well as the products themselves. It also takes your zip code and estimates
your shipping costs to show you which one is truly the lowest price. But I
like to use both pricewatch and pricegrabber to compare. I also sometimes
look at epinions.com to get customer reviews of products. I learned which
computer monitors to NOT get from epinions.
Research is always good. :-)
luv,
-Su
